paper_abstract: We address the question of the appearance of ordinary quantum mechanics in the context of noncommutative quantum mechanics. We review our derivation of the noncommutative extension of the Hu-Paz-Zhang master equation for a Brownian particle linearly coupled to a bath of harmonic oscillators. As a new contribution, we consider the particular case of an Ohmic regime.
paper_title: Environment-induced decoherence in noncommutative quantum mechanics
